code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://localhost:5002/api/users';const getAuthHeader=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return token?{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}:{};};export const getUsers=async()=>{const res=await axios.get(API_URL,{headers:getAuthHeader()});return res.data;};export const deleteUser=async id=>{await axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id),{headers:getAuthHeader()});};export const updateUser=async(id,user)=>{await axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id),user,{headers:getAuthHeader()});};
